name: NSFileProviderTestingModification
desc: An operation that syncs the modification of the source item to the target location.

items.name: var sourceItem: NSFileProviderItem
items.desc: A description of the source item.

items.name: var changedFields: NSFileProviderItemFields
items.desc: A list of the fields that changed.

items.name: var targetSide: NSFileProviderTestingOperationSide
items.desc: The target location for the modification operation.

items.name: var targetItemIdentifier: NSFileProviderItemIdentifier
items.desc: The unique identifier for the target item.

items.name: var targetItemBaseVersion: NSFileProviderItemVersion
items.desc: The version of the changed item.

items.name: var domainVersion: NSFileProviderDomainVersion?
items.desc: The domainâ€™s version when the change occurred.
